text: Need Lily Walker for Harvey Norman campaign. Budget around $2,444, looking for 3 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Press conference, 3 x Facebook story, 3 x Instagram post. 3 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
